This musta took super long with all the coloring and 3d stuff. Love it, kinda shitty when they reuse the concept of "bad dude talks to sex girl and then they decide to meet up for some reason, and gets drugged, almost gets raped with the penis touch vagina thing but saved by mc because he suddenly just becomes sherlock", but overall, I love the ending, something generic for once, which is good, I don't wanna see mc get killed by something and then sex girl gets raped forever, I'm here to jack off and be happy not be emotionally touched.
The translation is shit, but it’s nice to see an mc with a girl to fuck. Surrogate Father has a wife who doesn’t just work.
Haaa... I was waiting for this! 10/10
@alainmkii frfr like these idiots have no idea on how long it takes

been long since finding something good for a mamhua. need to properly earmark this. those who complain about translations, censorship or other shit, either bear with it or go somewhere else. the weekly chapter or monthly chapter taking too long is always there , cliffhanger? you expect artists and content creator not get paid? then wait for it to end before reading it. for someone who used to do NSFW commission stuff making two dozen pages is not easy,with a deadline its grueling hard. those who claim its easy are those who cant draw shit.
just read this on mangazclub lol
